title: About us
paragraph_1: We are TravelTrucks — a company specializing in modern camper rentals for comfortable travel across Ukraine.
paragraph_3: Our fleet includes 24 campers ranging from Economy to Premium class.
paragraph_4: We operate in Kyiv, Odesa, Kharkiv, Sumy, Poltava, Dnipro, and Lviv.
paragraph_5: The TravelTrucks team consists of young, energetic individuals.
paragraph_6: Booking the camper you want is easy — just give us a call or leave a request on our website!
